name: The Inn
storyline: Mike, a down on his luck guy who's been trying his life in the big city since he was 18. Life hasn't been kind to him the past few years, but it's all about to take a turn for the better (or worse?) when he meets a certain person.
summary: The Inn is a story driven Visual Novel made in Ren'Py. It's a comedic slice of life that pokes fun on common Visual Novel clichés and stereotypes. While playing The Inn you'll meet and befriend a lot of cute girls. I plan on each one of them having their own storyline, sometimes even overlapping with each other's.
